column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Best ever ever ever. I only get baked goods here
column2: as it seems like all of their savory food involves some kind of undercooked protein (not a fan!)... BUT their breads and pastries are second to none! They have a pumpkin croissant this time of year that is so rich I can't eat the whole thing. They used to have an olive-walnut loaf of bread that was my favorite. I didn't see it this last time - I hope they haven't stopped making it. Over all though
column3: I've tried probably 20 different baked goods here and I've never been disappointed. My husband says they make great espresso drinks
